title: Lesson 04 - One Minute French
description: In lesson 4 of One Minute French you will learn how to say you don't understand something. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute French at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute French is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
